attributes.action: Run the ROYAL MAIL as a 1st class PUBLIC SERVICE , not a MONEY FIRST, PEOPLE LAST, profit at the costomers expence  buisiness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Royal Mail should be run as a public service for the 60 Million people that it delivers to within the UK, not the few hundred top companies that it panders to at the present..... 1st. class service should mean just that !
They should be concentrating on delivering SERVICE to the public FIRST....Profit making second !

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Run the ROYAL MAIL as a 1st class PUBLIC SERVICE , not a MONEY FIRST, PEOPLE LAST, profit at the costomers expence buisiness."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15274.asp

Prime Minister's Office
